mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon (code, discount_percent, expires_at) VALUES (#{code}, #{discountPercent}, #{expiresAt})
mapper.select: SELECT c.coupon_id AS couponId, c.code AS code, c.discount_percent AS discountPercent, c.expires_at AS expiresAt, c.created_at AS createdAt FROM coupon c ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
